application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Maple (Acer) In Bluebell area	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 13m and spread 9mT2 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) In Bluebell area	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 3m. Final height 11m and spread 6mT3 - Lime (Tilia x europa) In Bluebell Area	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height 15m and spread 8mT4 - Sweet Chestnut (Castanea sativa) On right of drive	Remove 1 x lowest limb over driveway T5 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) By Rubbish area adjacent	Remove large suckers T6 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) Adjacent to above	Remonlith due to extensive decay T7 - Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) Leaning from right of far lawn	Reduce laterally by 2m 	T8 - Ash Adjacent to towpath	Remove 1 x low lateral growing back over grounds T9 - Red Oak (Quercus rubra) By Water feature	Remove 1 x leaf retentive dead limb
